get.summary: Get Annotation by URI (W3C Content Negotiation)
get.description: W3C-compliant globally resolvable annotation URI with content negotiation. Returns JSON-LD for API clients (Accept: application/ld+json or application/json). Redirects to frontend for browsers (Accept: text/html or browser User-Agent). Requires authentication and resourceId query parameter.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Resource ID or URI containing the annotation
